attributes.additional_details: We need the Government to take FND seriously by funding dedicated services, improving awareness, and ensuring those affected receive the same level of care and dignity as anyone living with a neurological illness.
attributes.background: We ask the UK Government to improve support and treatment for people with Functional Neurological Disorder (FND). This should include funding for specialist NHS clinics, mandatory training for healthcare professionals, and official recognition of FND as a serious neurological condition.

rejection.details: We think this petition is very similar to yours: Fund better Functional Neurological Disorder care, treatment and support: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727063
